title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Where Tipalt Burn falls into Tyne, stand on the opposite bank the ruinsof Bellister Castle.

title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Away, far up the South Tyne, and up its tributary the Tipalt Burn, closeto the boundary of Cumberland, there stands all that is left of anancient castle, centuries ago the home of an old and once powerfulfamily.
